00023         public async void Handle_Clicked(object sender, System.EventArgs e)
00024         {
00025             var view = new NavigationPage(new DetailedMedicationPage());
00026             view.BarBackgroundColor = Color.FromRgb(25, 25, 40);
00027             view.BarTextColor = Color.White;
00028 
00029             await Navigation.PushModalAsync(view);
00030         }
00031 
00032         void Handle_ItemSelected(object sender, Xamarin.Forms.SelectedItemChangedEventArgs e)
00033         {
00034             var view = new NavigationPage(new DetailedMedicationPage(e.SelectedItem));
00035             view.BarBackgroundColor = Color.FromRgb(25, 25, 40);
00036             view.BarTextColor = Color.White;
00037             Navigation.PushModalAsync(view);
00038         }
00039     }
